quotes.message: Dating is about finding out who you are and who others are. If you show up in a masquerade outfit, neither is going to happen.
quotes.name: Henry Cloud

quotes.message: In its purest form, dating is auditioning for mating (and auditioning means we may or may not get the part).
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: Dating is a battleground filled with deception and infidelity.
quotes.name: Andrew S. Trees

quotes.message: Dating is really all about sex. In the conventional context, this means that the man invites the woman to go through a social encounter, the ultimate purpose of which is sexual engagement.
quotes.name: Alexander Mccall Smith

quotes.message: Dating is a give and take. If you only see it as 'taking,' you are not getting it.
quotes.name: Henry Cloud

quotes.message: Everybody knows the pressure of a first date: Searching for that perfect outfit. Hunting for ways to be engaging. Dissecting each detail when it's over to check for mistakes. Dating can make even the most confident person lose his cool.
quotes.name: Kelly Starling

quotes.message: Dating a girl with a guy best friend is never easy.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Internet dating is the fastest, most efficient way to gather a pool of qualified candidates. It could take you a lifetime to do the investigation that the computer comes up with in seconds.
quotes.name: Judsen Culbreth

quotes.message: Online dating is just as murky and full of lemons as finding a used car in the classifieds. Once you learn the lingo, it's easier to spot the models with high mileage and no warranty.
quotes.name: Laurie Perry

quotes.message: There is so much hurt in this game of searching for a mate, of testing, trying. And you realize suddenly that you forgot it was a game, and turn away in tears.
quotes.name: Sylvia Plath

quotes.message: Dating should be less about matching outward circumstances than meeting your inner necessity.
quotes.name: Mark Amend

quotes.message: Whenever I date a guy, I think, 'Is this the man I want my children to spend their weekends with?'
quotes.name: Rita Rudner

quotes.message: Never date a woman you can hear ticking.
quotes.name: Mark Patinkin

quotes.message: Dating an ex is the equivalent of failing a test you already had the answers to.
quotes.name: Kendrick Cole

quotes.message: Dating is different when you get older. You're not as trusting, or as eager to get back out there and expose yourself to someone.
quotes.name: Toni Braxton

quotes.message: Every time you date someone with an issue that you have to work to ignore, you're settling.
quotes.name: Andre Breton

quotes.message: Employees make the best dates. You don't have to pick them up and they're always tax-deductible.
quotes.name: Andy Warhol

quotes.message: Date someone because you already see a future, not because you want to see if you would work out.
quotes.name: Sarah Moores

quotes.message: A person's readiness to date is largely a matter of maturity and environment.
quotes.name: Dr. Myles Munroe

quotes.message: Well, dating has become a sport and not about finding the person you love.
quotes.name: Rashida Jones

quotes.message: Dating is really hard because everyone puts on a front. It's really difficult to see who is who, so it is important to be yourself.
quotes.name: Brooke Burke

quotes.message: Dating now is a lot like going shopping when you don't have any money. Even if you find the right thing, you can't do anything about it.
quotes.name: Joshua Harris

quotes.message: People tend to look at dating sort of like a safari - like they're trying to land the trophy.
quotes.name: Henry Cloud

quotes.message: Dating is all about the chase.
quotes.name: Lauren Conrad

quotes.message: Dating someone on the opposite end of the happy spectrum teaches you an incredible amount of patience.
quotes.name: Chris Pine

quotes.message: Dating someone exclusively for four months in New York is like four years in Anchorage.
quotes.name: Zack Love

quotes.message: Dating a man is like flying a kite. You only need to know when to wind up the string or let it out.
quotes.name: Jenna Alatari

quotes.message: You didn't date someone to change him. You dated him because you wanted him for the way he was. Flaws and fears and all.
quotes.name: Jean Oram

quotes.message: Basically, dating is like climbing a volcano and you never know when it's going to erupt, dumping molten lava and burning you.
quotes.name: Robin Bielman

quotes.message: To be happy with a man, you must understand him a lot and love him a little. To be happy with a woman you must love her a lot and not try to understand her at all.
quotes.name: Helen Rowlnad

quotes.message: When you've exhausted the traditional dating channels of casual bar encounters and awkward exchanges at the grocery store, the option of online dating is a ray of hope in an otherwise desolate field of desperation and loneliness.
quotes.name: Alfred Jarry

quotes.message: Before you enter into the world of online dating, be prepared with what to say in case your date looks less the pictures you saw online and moe like a sunburned walrus.
quotes.name: Alfred Jarry

quotes.message: It's afterward you realize that the feeling of happiness you had with a man didn't necessarily prove that you loved him.
quotes.name: Marguerite Duras

quotes.message: And I shall find some girl perhaps, and a better one than you. With eyes as wise, but kindlier, and lips as soft, but true, and I daresay she will do.
quotes.name: Rupert Brooke

quotes.message: Watching your daughter being collected by her date feels like handing over a $1 million Stradivarius to a gorilla.
quotes.name: Jim Bishop

quotes.message: Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should live next door and just visit now and then.
quotes.name: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.message: Men will sleep with women they wouldn't date, and women will date men they wouldn't sleep with.
quotes.name: Rebecca Christian

quotes.message: I know we've only just met, but I have the feeling that I've known you all my life because every little thing you do drives me up the wall.
quotes.name: Dan Piraro

quotes.message: I'm afraid of dating. When the guy shows up at the door, I give him my purse and beg him not to hurt me.
quotes.name: Maria Bamford

quotes.message: I'm dating a homeless woman. It's easier to get her to stay over.
quotes.name: Gary Shandling

quotes.message: My biggest problem with dating is that I have no game. Some women can just bat their eyes and men come running. The men just keep popping up one after another. It's like they have a magical man-filled Pez dispenser.
quotes.name: Lori Giarnella

quotes.message: Opposites attract— and then aggravate.
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: Everyone knows that dating in your thirties is not the happy-go-lucky free-for-all it was when you were twenty-two.
quotes.name: Helen Fielding

quotes.message: Dating a grad student was like making hurried-up popcorn: lots of butter, high heat, instant noise.
quotes.name: Will Weaver

quotes.message: Dating, after all is still about two people who are interested in one another and want to get together at a specific time and place.
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: Dating requires a leap of faith that the two of you can have a good time together for an hour or two.
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: Dating is an emotional experience. You're vulnerable. You're letting someone you barely know see the real you.
quotes.name: Joy Browne

quotes.message: A date may be just a pleasant coming together; a way of saying thank you for a favor, or it may be a delicate step in a courtship and mating dance.
quotes.name: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.message: But the one thing that says it all about dating is: it is about communication.
quotes.name: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.message: The bottomline is that dating is supposed to be fun and enjoyable. Maybe a few butterflies will flutter in your tummy but that is part of the thrill of dating.
quotes.name: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.message: Dating is something you do before making binding choices or exclusive commitments.
quotes.name: Rebecca Sharp Colmer

quotes.message: “To say that one waits a lifetime for his soulmate to come around is a paradox. People eventually get sick of waiting, take a chance on someone, and by the art of commitment become soulmates, which takes a lifetime to perfect.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: You know, the man of my dreams might walk round the corner tomorrow. I'm older and wiser and I think I'd make a great girlfriend. I live in the realm of romantic possibility.
quotes.name: Stevie Nicks

quotes.message: “Better to put your heart on the line, risk everything, and walk away with nothing than play it safe. Love is a lot of things, but “safe” isn't one of them.
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: Don't look for a partner who is eye candy. Look for a partner who is soul food.
quotes.name: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.message: Dating is like searching for the perfect wine. One date is too fruity, another too dry, and still another too much bouquet (cologne overdose). But once you find the perfect variety that suits your taste, get drunk.
quotes.name: Katie Kosko

quotes.message: Everything he does while you're dating is like a crystal ball predicting what he's going to be like after you're married. If you don't like a habit of his, honey, unless you fix it before the altar, it's there to stay.
quotes.name: Bethany Jett

quotes.message: Dating with no intent to marry is like going to the grocery store with no money. You either leave unhappy or take something that isn't yours.
quotes.name: Jefferson Bethke

quotes.message: Dating is like trying to make a meal out of leftovers. Some leftovers actually get better when they've had a little time to mature. But others should be thrown out right away, No matter how you try to warm them up, they're never as good as when they were new.
quotes.name: Lisa Kleypas
